title: Unable to connect to server even with connected internet
body: My internet connection is working fine and i have no had an issue connecting before, it has happened to me 3 times and now i'm in leaverbuster queue. Is anyone else experiencing this for the first time.

replies.body: While this very well may be related to a hardware issue, let's try troubleshooting down the software solutions first. Try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Support article, and let me know if anything worked. If you're still encountering issues following those solutions, just let us know and we'll troubleshoot with you further!

I've been getting this randomly, I.E: Play 3 games no issues, then bang, cant connect to the game from the start. Immediately search again after it inevitably gets remade, and I get into a game no problem. Infuriating cause its just happened now and I've been leavebuster qeued as well...

I've been experiencing this and here's the fix I've found :)
https://helpdesk.flexradio.com/hc/en-us/articles/202118518-Optimizing-Ethernet-Adapter-Settings-for-Maximum-Performance

Yepp got the same and now im getting banned. Did transfer from EU-West to here yesterday becouse i moved to Australia and had never the problem there. Thanks for that Riot.

is there anywhere you can complain about this so you dont get banned without a reason?
